data.title: City National Grove of Anaheim
data.text:
Hobo Fabulous

Craig Ferguson brings his “Hobo Fabulous” standup comedy show to The Theatre at ACE Hotel on April 4. The Grammy® nominated, Emmy® and Peabody® award winning comedian will perform all new material during the show.

Craig Ferguson entered the world of late night comedy following a diverse and eclectic career that encompasses film, television and the stage. In December 2014, Ferguson concluded his ten-year run as the host of CBS’s “The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson,” which set all-time viewer records, earned him a Primetime Emmy nomination and the 2009 Peabody Award for Excellence in Broadcasting for his interview with Archbishop Desmond Tutu. As the host of “Celebrity Name Game,” Ferguson was awarded the Daytime Emmy for Outstanding Game Show Host two years in a row.
